poem.title: Ida Nettleship
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
A throw of the dice, a threesome,
His sketch of the two young women
Comes back to me like an early prayer.
The wife, as sempstress, took up the thread
With its reversal, dearth of choice,
Too many children, death at thirty.
She ran to earth, he harvested
Empty thunder.
